title: Scale Rating Activity
description: Schema for an activity where users provide a rating on a numerical scale.

min.description: The minimum value of the rating scale.

max.description: The maximum value of the rating scale. Should be greater than min.

minLabel.description: An optional label for the minimum value (e.g., 'Confused').

maxLabel.description: An optional label for the maximum value (e.g., 'Confident').
